Services & Prices

We provide different kinds of services depending on your needs. We have our web services to help you get your web presence started or improved. Our data backup services help you keep your critical corporate data safe. See our plans below or contact us for a custom quote.

Web Services

We offer a couple different types of web service. Whether you're a business just starting out and you need a website developed or you're an established empire, we have a plan for you.

DIY Website

From $30/Month
  • Develop your website your way with the minimal WonderCMS conetent management system.
  • Let us handle the technical details.
  • Automatic security updates.
  • Support to setup and secure your site.
  • Use your own domain (yourdomain.ca).
  • +$15 to host in Calgary.

Wordpress Website

From $40/Month
  • Develop your website with the Wordpress framework.
  • Automatic security updates.
  • Support to setup and secure your site.
  • Use your own domain (yourdomain.ca).
  • +$15 to host in Calgary.

Custom Website

From $1000; $40/Month
  • Let us develop a custom service for your business's unique needs.
  • We can even host it for you after development.
  • Fully managed service. Nothing to do or worry about.
  • Use your own domain or let us help you find one.
  • Host locally in Calgary for an additional $15/Month.

Data Services

We offer three tiers of data services. Whether you have a small business and need to backup your critical information or you need a multiple terabyte full backup once a week, we have a plan for you.

Basic Backup

From ¢50/GB/Month
  • Secure your company's most critical data.
  • Support for secure rsync and sftp data transfer protocols.
  • Backup at speeds up to 300Mbps.
  • Secure yourself with an off-site backup location in Calgary.
  • Fault tolerant drives.

Bulk Backup

From $100/500GB/Month
  • A good doeal for large databases or small workstations.
  • Support for secure rsync and sftp data transfer protocols.
  • Backup at speeds up to 300Mbps.
  • Secure yourself with an off-site backup location in Calgary.
  • Fault tolerant drives.

Beast Backup

From $150/TB/Month
  • Secure all your company's important data down to the last detail.
  • Support for secure rsync and sftp data transfer protocols.
  • Backup at speeds up to 300Mbps.
  • Secure yourself with an off-site backup location in Calgary.
  • Fault tolerant drives.

If your needs exceed the scope of any of these plans, contact us for a quote.
